segment.source: The authors of this publication can not be edited because it has already been published.
segment.target: The authors of this publication can not be edited because it has already been published.

segment.source: The publication for this author could not be found.
segment.target: The publication for this author could not be found.

segment.source: Provide a formatted list of references for works cited in this submission. Please separate individual references with a blank line.
segment.target: Provide a formatted list of references for works cited in this submission. Please separate individual references with a blank line.

segment.source: New reviews have been submitted and are being considered by the editor.
segment.target: New reviews have been submitted and are being considered by the editor.

segment.source: Your submission has been uploaded and is ready to be sent. You may go back to review and adjust any of the information you have entered before continuing. When you are ready, click "Finish Submission".
segment.target: Your submission has been uploaded and is ready to be sent. You may go back to review and adjust any of the information you have entered before continuing. When you are ready, click "Finish Submission".

segment.source: Select the role that best describes your contribution to this submission.
segment.target: Select the role that best describes your contribution to this submission.

segment.source: Yes, I would like to be contacted about this submission.
segment.target: Yes, I would like to be contacted about this submission.

segment.source: Submit in any of the following roles if you would like to be able to edit and publish this submission yourself: {$managerGroups}
segment.target: Submit in any of the following roles if you would like to be able to edit and publish this submission yourself: {$managerGroups}

segment.source: You must read and acknowledge that you've completed the requirements below before proceeding.
segment.target: You must read and acknowledge that you've completed the requirements below before proceeding.

segment.source: Thank you for your interest in publishing with {$contextName}.
segment.target: Thank you for your interest in publishing with {$contextName}.

segment.source: Yes, I agree to abide by the terms of the copyright statement.
segment.target: Yes, I agree to abide by the terms of the copyright statement.

segment.source: Please enter a valid CrossRef registration email. You can register your email for free on the CrossRef web site.
segment.target: Please enter a valid CrossRef registration email. You can register your email for free on the CrossRef web site.

segment.source: Please enter your ISBNdb API key. If you don't have a key yet you can request one for free from the ISBNdb project.
segment.target: Please enter your ISBNdb API key. If you don't have a key yet you can request one for free from the ISBNdb project.

segment.source: Please enter a valid PubMed registration email if you have one.
segment.target: Please enter a valid PubMed registration email if you have one.

segment.source: Please enter a valid WorldCat API key if you have one.
segment.target: Please enter a valid WorldCat API key if you have one.

segment.source: Please select one of the given citation modules.
segment.target: Please select one of the given citation modules.

segment.source: Don't use by default (will still be available to the editor)
segment.target: Don't use by default (will still be available to the editor)

segment.source: Internal error. A non-valid value has been posted for the 'optional filter' setting. Please report this as a bug.
segment.target: Internal error. A non-valid value has been posted for the 'optional filter' setting. Please report this as a bug.

segment.source: For best results, authors should be entered in the following format: Coleman Jr, D. (Ralf) Dr.
segment.target: For best results, authors should be entered in the following format: Coleman Jr, D. (Ralf) Dr.

segment.source: For best results, editors should be entered in the following format: Coleman Jr, D. (Ralf) Dr.
segment.target: For best results, editors should be entered in the following format: Coleman Jr, D. (Ralf) Dr.

segment.source: Please enter a valid article/paper title.
segment.target: Please enter a valid article/paper title.

segment.source: Please enter a valid publication title.
segment.target: Please enter a valid publication title.

segment.source: Please enter a valid publication date (format: YYYY-MM-DD).
segment.target: Please enter a valid publication date (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

segment.source: Please enter a valid access date (format: YYYY-MM-DD).
segment.target: Please enter a valid access date (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

segment.source: Please enter a valid season identifier.
segment.target: Please enter a valid season identifier.

segment.source: Please enter a valid chapter title.
segment.target: Please enter a valid chapter title.

segment.target: Please enter a valid conference date (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

segment.target: Please enter a valid conference location.

segment.source: Please enter a valid conference name.
segment.target: Please enter a valid conference name.

segment.source: Please enter a valid conference sponsor.
segment.target: Please enter a valid conference sponsor.

segment.source: Please enter a valid first page (must be a numeric value).
segment.target: Please enter a valid first page (must be a numeric value).

segment.source: Please enter a valid last page (must be a numeric value).
segment.target: Please enter a valid last page (must be a numeric value).

segment.source: Please enter a valid total number of pages (must be a numeric value).
segment.target: Please enter a valid total number of pages (must be a numeric value).

segment.source: Please enter a valid publisher location.
segment.target: Please enter a valid publisher location.

segment.source: Please enter a valid publisher name.
segment.target: Please enter a valid publisher name.

segment.source: Please enter a valid ISBN (9 or 13 numbers).
segment.target: Please enter a valid ISBN (9 or 13 numbers).

segment.source: Please enter a valid Print ISSN.
segment.target: Please enter a valid Print ISSN.

segment.source: Please enter a valid custom publication ID.
segment.target: Please enter a valid custom publication ID.

segment.source: Please enter a valid alternative link to the publication.
segment.target: Please enter a valid alternative link to the publication.

segment.source: Please make sure that you always set a publication type. Currently supported values are book (for books or book chapters) and journal (for journal articles). Otherwise the citation output formatting will not work correctly.
segment.target: Please make sure that you always set a publication type. Currently supported values are book (for books or book chapters) and journal (for journal articles). Otherwise the citation output formatting will not work correctly.

segment.source: Please make sure that you set a valid title type. Supported values are 'abbreviated', 'translated', 'alternative' and 'uniform'.
segment.target: Please make sure that you set a valid title type. Supported values are 'abbreviated', 'translated', 'alternative' and 'uniform'.

segment.source: Part of title ignored while sorting
segment.target: Part of title ignored while sorting

segment.source: Please only enter the initial characters of the title that should be ignored when sorting the title.
segment.target: Please only enter the initial characters of the title that should be ignored when sorting the title.

segment.source: Please enter a valid part number.
segment.target: Please enter a valid part number.

segment.source: Please enter a valid part name.
segment.target: Please enter a valid part name.

segment.source: Please make sure that you set a valid name type. Supported values are 'personal', 'corporate' and 'conference'.
segment.target: Please make sure that you set a valid name type. Supported values are 'personal', 'corporate' and 'conference'.

segment.source: Enter each reference on a new line so that they can be extracted and recorded separately.
segment.target: Enter each reference on a new line so that they can be extracted and recorded separately.

segment.source: The following references have been extracted and will be linked to the submission metadata.
segment.target: The following references have been extracted and will be linked to the submission metadata.

segment.target: Are you sure you would like to delete this comment?

segment.target: Are you sure you want to clear the email log for this submission?

segment.target: {$name} ({$username}) was assigned to this submission as a {$userGroupName}.

segment.target: Are you sure you want to clear the event log for this submission?

segment.target: Are you sure you want to delete this event log entry?

segment.target: The authors are now allowed to edit metadata when submission in stage {stage}.

segment.target: The authors are now not allowed to edit metadata when submission in stage {stage}.

segment.target: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this galley?

segment.target: Are you sure you want to remove this image from the galley?

segment.target: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this supplementary file?

segment.target: Typically used to identify the file format (e.g. PDF, HTML, etc.).

segment.target: Please provide a valid remote URL (include http://).

segment.target: No style sheet file has been added to this galley.

segment.target: If you wish, you may enter a brief statement about the access rights held in or over this submission.

segment.source: No editor has been assigned to this submission.
segment.target: No editor has been assigned to this submission.

segment.source: Is this submission derived from another resource? If so, you may enter a URL or description of that resource.
segment.target: Is this submission derived from another resource? If so, you may enter a URL or description of that resource.

segment.target: Include this contributor in browse lists?

segment.source: Add additional information for your submission. Press 'enter' after each term.
segment.target: Add additional information for your submission. Press 'enter' after each term.

segment.source: Submissions in several languages are accepted. Choose the primary language of the submission from the pulldown above.
segment.target: Submissions in several languages are accepted. Choose the primary language of the submission from the pulldown above.

segment.source: The submission type is usually one of 'image', 'text', or other multimedia types including 'software' or 'interactive'. Please choose the one most relevant for your submission. Examples may be found at http://dublincore.org/documents/2001/04/12/usageguide/generic.shtml#type
segment.target: The submission type is usually one of 'image', 'text', or other multimedia types including 'software' or 'interactive'. Please choose the one most relevant for your submission. Examples may be found at http://dublincore.org/documents/2001/04/12/usageguide/generic.shtml#type

segment.source: Please wait while your file is uploaded to the server.
segment.target: Please wait while your file is uploaded to the server.

segment.source: A name is required for this item.
segment.target: A name is required for this item.

segment.source: You must enter a file name for this file
segment.target: You must enter a file name for this file

segment.source: The name of the uploaded file resembles the name of a previously uploaded file, "{$revisedFileName}." Is this file intended to replace "{$revisedFileName}"? If so, select the file below. Otherwise, select "This is not a revision of an existing file" before proceeding.
segment.target: The name of the uploaded file resembles the name of a previously uploaded file, "{$revisedFileName}." Is this file intended to replace "{$revisedFileName}"? If so, select the file below. Otherwise, select "This is not a revision of an existing file" before proceeding.

segment.source: Please select the file you would like to revise.
segment.target: Please select the file you would like to revise.

segment.source: If you are uploading a revision of an existing file, please indicate which file.
segment.target: If you are uploading a revision of an existing file, please indicate which file.

segment.source: This is not a revision of an existing file
segment.target: This is not a revision of an existing file

segment.source: Upload this file in my role as...
segment.target: Upload this file in my role as...

segment.source: If you are submitting an Edited Volume, you should upload all volume chapters individually, under your role as volume editor.
segment.target: If you are submitting an Edited Volume, you should upload all volume chapters individually, under your role as volume editor.

segment.source: After reviewing the assigned file, record any comments on the file below, and/or upload an annotated copy of the file (or another file).
segment.target: After reviewing the assigned file, record any comments on the file below, and/or upload an annotated copy of the file (or another file).

segment.source: Upload a File Ready for Publication
segment.target: Upload a File Ready for Publication

segment.source: There are no files for you to revise at this time.
segment.target: There are no files for you to revise at this time.

segment.source: The submission must be resubmitted for another review round.
segment.target: The submission must be resubmitted for another review round.

segment.source: Submission has been resubmitted for another review round.
segment.target: Submission has been resubmitted for another review round.

segment.source: Waiting for reviewers to be assigned.
segment.target: Waiting for reviewers to be assigned.

segment.source: All reviewers have responded and a decision is needed.
segment.target: All reviewers have responded and a decision is needed.

segment.source: New editorial recommendations have been submitted.
segment.target: New editorial recommendations have been submitted.

segment.source: All recommendations are in and a decision is needed.
segment.target: All recommendations are in and a decision is needed.

segment.source: Users are assigned to stages of the workflow by user group. Any user assigned to this stage will automatically be assigned to other stages to which their user group has been assigned. This is commonly reserved for editors, authors and translators.
segment.target: Users are assigned to stages of the workflow by user group. Any user assigned to this stage will automatically be assigned to other stages to which their user group has been assigned. This is commonly reserved for editors, authors and translators.

segment.source: You are about to remove this participant from all stages.
segment.target: You are about to remove this participant from all stages.

segment.source: You must select a user group.
segment.target: You must select a user group.

segment.source: You must select a user for the specified user group.
segment.target: You must select a user for the specified user group.

segment.source: The participant you selected has been assigned to conduct a blind review. If you assign them as a participant, they will have access to the author's identity. You are encouraged not to assign this participant unless you can independently ensure the integrity of the peer review process.
segment.target: The participant you selected has been assigned to conduct a blind review. If you assign them as a participant, they will have access to the author's identity. You are encouraged not to assign this participant unless you can independently ensure the integrity of the peer review process.

segment.target: Are you sure you want the authors of this submission to be unable to edit the submission's metadata at that stage?

segment.target: The page proof file must be checked as approved to be made Available. Do you want to approve it?

segment.target: This file proof will no longer be publicly available for download or purchase. Do you want to disapprove it?

segment.target: Assign an editor to enable the editorial decisions for this stage.

segment.target: Recommend an editorial decision for this submission.

segment.target: Select the files you would like to forward to the {$stageName} stage.

segment.target: There was an error trying to assign the auditor. Please Try again.
